item.description:
*The popular dance called West Coast Swing is a bit soft, a bit smooth, a
> > bit seductive and definitely fun. It is now being taught by a great
> > instructor in Worcester. It may be something you would like to give a try
> > as a New Year's resolution. Broaden your horizons in 2007 - dance!!! So
> > here are the details. *
> >
> > - $50.00 per person for 10 weeks!!!
> > - $75.00 per couple for 10 weeks!!!
> > - Sat, Jan 13 start date 4:00-5:00
> > - Steele Shane - instructor extraordinaire
> > - Poise, Style & Motion Dance Studio - 290 W Exit 12 Harding St.
> > - www.psmdance.com for all the details
> > - Call to register 508-752-4910
> > - email Steve the owner at info@psmdance
> > - Bring a friend! or a whole group of friends.(Nancy- this is for
> > the group)
> >
> > PLEASE< RSVP directly to the studio if you WILL attend.
item.name: Wanna learn a new dance???
